quote: We're born free. I am free. If someone is willing to take my freedom, I won't hesitate to take theirs.
If you win, you live. If you lose, you die. If you don't fight, you can't win!
To surpass monsters, you have to discard your humanity.
Everyone can make a choice after they have learned what it will result in... But you don't know what your choice will result in before actually choosing.
I don't like the terms 'good person' or 'bad person.' It is impossible to be entirely good to everyone.
If there are humans who can bring about change, they're those who are capable of abandoning everything.
I thought I heard dirt moving around in the shape of an idiot. So it was you?
A person who cannot give up anything, can change nothing.
There's nothing further removed from freedom than ignorance.
What's so good about giving up? Is it better to escape from reality, to the point where you're throwing away your hope?
You know personally, I think nothing instills discipline like pain.
Because I was born into this world.
Those who don't know themselves don't know their strength.
Fear is not something you overcome. It's something you learn to live with.
Curses are born from human negativity. The more fear and hatred there is in the world, the stronger they become.
The only way to defeat a curse is with a stronger curse.
The world is not what it seems. There's a whole other world out there that most people don't even know exists.
Humans are weak creatures. They're easily manipulated and controlled by their emotions.
In a world full of curses, you must become a curse yourself.
The only thing more terrifying than a curse is a human being.
The true power of jujutsu lies not in technique, but in the heart of the sorcerer.
The path of a sorcerer is one of sacrifice. We must give up everything we hold dear in order to protect the world from curses.
I'm not gonna run away, I never go back on my word! Even if I die, I'll never give up on my dream of becoming Hokage!
You don't have to like me, but I will always be here for you.
Believe it!
If you don't like the hand that fate's dealt you with, fight for a new one.
A shinobi's life is lived with the understanding that death is always a possibility.
The true measure of a shinobi is not how they live, but how they die.
The leaf village is my home. I will protect it with my life.
A true hero never gives up, even when there's no hope.
The future is never set in stone. It's up to us to change it.
Love is the most powerful force in the world.
Friendship is a bond that can never be broken.
Never give up on your dreams, no matter what.
The only thing that can defeat fear is courage.
The true meaning of strength is not about how much power you have, but about how you use it.
The world is full of possibilities. The only thing that's stopping you is yourself.
You can't move forward if you're always looking back.
I don't care what you say. I'm gonna be the Pirate King!
A dream is not made reality through talent alone. Character is more important.
It's not about victory. It's about not giving up until the very end.
A man's dream will never die!
A man should stand tall even in the face of death.
A true hero is someone who fights not for himself, but for his friends.
The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your hands.
A pirate's life is full of adventure!
The world is a vast and wonderful place. It's full of possibilities.
A true friend is someone who will always be there for you, no matter what.
A true warrior needs no blade.
True strength is not in the body. True strength lies in the mind.
Freedom is what everyone wants, but it's not easily obtained.
Even if we die, our legend will live on.
Revenge is a powerful motivator, but it can also consume you.
True happiness is found in peaceful moments.
War breeds nothing but death and sorrow.
The only way to stop a cycle of violence is through forgiveness.
Strength in unity can overcome the greatest of challenges.
The pursuit of power often leads to one's downfall.
Courage is not the absence of fear. It is the ability to face it.
Strength is not just physical power, but the power to protect others.
The past is something you should learn from, not run from.
True warriors use their swords only to protect life.
We are shaped by our thoughts; we become what we think. When the mind is pure, joy follows like a shadow that never leaves.
Sometimes the thing that is holding you back is all in your head.
No matter how deep the night, it always turns to day, eventually.
A man chooses. A slave obeys.
The ones who break the rules are scum, but those who abandon their friends are worse than scum.
There is nothing that is absolute in this world. Even the brightest flame eventually flickers and goes out.
Your 'intent' is not enough. You must be willing to put your life on the line!
Don't ever give up. Even if it's painful, even if it's agonizing, stay true to yourself.
The bond between Nezuko and I can't be severed by anyone!
Crying doesn't mean you're weak. It means you've been strong for too long.
To be able to cut off your own head... you must be able to see through your own neck.
When you're going through hell, keep going.
Weaklings will stay weak forever. But weakness is not evil, so stay strong.
I'll carry on the feelings of those who've died. That's why I'll continue to fight!
Even in the face of tragedy, a truly strong person will summon the courage to smile.
Humans are fragile. They easily break when they fall.
The moment you give up is the moment you let someone else win.
There's no match that we can't win.
Volleyball is a sport where you're always looking up!
The only ones who can beat me are me...and the strongest.
It's not the victory that's most important. It's the fight.
If you're going to hit it, hit it until it breaks!
The stronger the opponent, the more fun it gets!
The past doesn't exist here. Only the future.
The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy.
Even if we're not confident that we'll win, even if others tell us we don't stand a chance, we must never tell ourselves that.
